Tuning: **D A D F# A D**: Including an octave perspective, the tuning is written D2-A2-D3-F#3-A3-D4, meaning that the lowest string is a D note on the second octave, the second lowest string is a A note on the second octave and so on. Standard tuning reference: E2-A2-D3-G3-B3-E4.

## All common major chords in open D

D: 000000 / 000004\

F: XX3333 / 333333\
G: XX5555 / 555555\
A: XX7777 / 777777\
B: XX9999 / 999999\
C: X X 10 10 10 10 / 10 10 10 10 10 10

## Étude, Open D: I, IV and V chords
